title: Segmented Bowl
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

see Signed on bottom, incised: [M. SHULER  #307  BIRDSEYE MAP
description: outward-flaring bowl with conical shape with slightly flattened bottom; bands of rectangular light-colored wood segments (pie piece-shaped at center) separated by thin red bands
creditline: Gift of the collection of Mari and Irving Lipton
